mapper.select:
select
from moumou.users_#{tableNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND phone IS NOT NULL AND phone <> '' AND sex IS NOT NULL AND salary IS NOT NULL AND age_group IS NOT NULL AND married IS NOT NULL AND binding_mobile IS NOT NULL AND phone <> '' AND binding_mobile <> '' AND avatar IS NOT NULL AND avatar <> '' AND nick_name IS NOT NULL AND nick_name <> ''

SELECT u.id AS userId, u.avatar AS userAvatar, u.nick_name AS userNickName, u.phone AS phone, u.sex AS sex, u.address AS address, b.certification_type AS certificationType FROM users_#{tableNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} u LEFT JOIN business b ON (u.id = b.user_id) WHERE u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select phone, nick_name, binding_mobile, 8 num from users_#{tableNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where DATEDIFF(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},last_login_time) = 8 AND (phone IS NOT NULL OR binding_mobile IS NOT NULL) UNION select phone, nick_name, binding_mobile, 15 num from users_#{tableNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where DATEDIFF(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},last_login_time) = 15 AND (phone IS NOT NULL OR binding_mobile IS NOT NULL) UNION select phone, nick_name, binding_mobile, 31 num from users_#{tableNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where DATEDIFF(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},last_login_time) = 31 AND (phone IS NOT NULL OR binding_mobile IS NOT NULL)
